argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ltrniotaval.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 2 |  | ltrniotaval.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 3 |  | ltrniotaval.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 4 |  | ltrniotaval.t | |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ltrniotaval.f | |- F = ( iota_ f e. T ( f ` P ) = Q ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_ltrniotacl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> F e. T ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 9 | 8, 3, 4 | #P_ltrn1o | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T ) -> F : ( Base ` K ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 7, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> F : ( Base ` K ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_simp2l | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> P e. A ) |
| 12 | 8, 2 | #P_atbase | |- ( P e. A -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> P e. ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( F : ( Base ` K ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` K ) /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_ltrniotaval | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( F ` P ) = Q ) |
| 16 |  | #P_f1ocnvfv | |- ( ( F : ( Base ` K ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` K ) /\ P e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( ( F ` P ) = Q -> ( `' F ` Q ) = P ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 15, 16 | #P_sylc | |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( `' F ` Q ) = P ) |
